{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is asking for the best method to test the statistical significance of the differences between means of two groups. The Chi square test is used for categorical data. Multiple regression analysis is used when there are multiple independent variables. Correlation coefficient analysis is used to measure the strength and direction of the relationship between two variables. The Student's t-test, however, is used specifically to compare the means of two groups to determine if they are significantly different from each other.", "answer_choice": "D"}
